page.title: 06Coniston village
page.content: {Coniston}is a small village, at the junction of the B5285 with the A593 Ambleside to Broughton road.{Church {Beck}flows through the centre of the village, and the shops, garage, bank, church and P.O. are grouped around the junction of roads and the bridge. The village is{compact;}the older housing mostly on high ground, but more recent building has extended the village onto flat lowland areas near the lake. A linear development of housing extends S along the A593 for about 1km, known as{Bowmanstead}and{Haws Bank.}There are 3 churches: Anglican, Methodist and Catholic, and a Christian house fellowship. The{Ruskin Institute}is a centre for village activities, including the{library,}open on Wednesdays only. There is a small green near the village centre with a memorial seat to{Donald Campbell.
